caption: The image is a Ramadan Kareem greeting card. The text in the image reads "May the blessings of Ramadan pour your life with happiness, togetherness and triumphs." The card features a gold mosque and a crescent moon, which are symbols of Islam and Ramadan. The card is decorated with stars and gold accents, adding to its festive appearance.
original_title: Modern Ornamental Ramadan Kareem Instagram Story
texts:
May the blessings of Ramadan pour
your life with happiness,
togetherness and
triumphs.
